sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1383151_bkquest_borrow</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1383151_bkquest_borrow">borrow_statusVALCHANGES^borrow_status=extend^EQ<item display_value="-- None --" endquery="false" field="borrow_status" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item display_value="Extend" endquery="false" field="borrow_status" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="extend"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Set Returned Date on Return Book</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Check if borrow_status was changed to "Extend"
    if (current.borrow_status == 'extend') {
        var currentDueDate = new GlideDateTime(current.due_date);
        currentDueDate.addDaysUTC(current.days_late || 14); // Extend due date by 14 days using UTC time
        current.due_date = currentDueDate; // Update the due_date field
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>harini.srija</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-21 07:43:52</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>36c7fe2f93f20210ef267c5efaba106e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Returned Date on Return Book</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BookQuest" source="x_1383151_bkquest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BookQuest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_36c7fe2f93f20210ef267c5efaba106e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>harini.srija</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-21 07:51:35</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=36c7fe2f93f20210ef267c5efaba106e"/></record_update>
